titles.title: JP252 The Wise Man built his house upon a rock

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Wise Man Built His House Upon a Rock
The wise man built his house upon a rock
The wise man built his house upon a rock
And the rain came tumbling down.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
the rain came down
and the floods came up.
The rain came down
and the floods came up.
The rain came down
and the floods came up
And the house upon a rock stood firm.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The foolish man built his house upon the sand
The foolish man built his house upon the sand
The foolish man built his house upon the sand
And the rain came tumbling down.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
the rain came down
and the floods came up.
The rain came down
and the floods came up.
The rain came down
and the floods came up.
And the house upon the sand went CRASH!
